overview:
John Stack is the founder of 3 Big Heads, a startup consulting firm located north of Boston.

After leaving IBM as Group Manager of the PartnerWorld for Software ISV Program, John was Managing Director of the Americas for Presence Online, a content management software company that was purchased by IBM in 2003. Previous to IBM, John was Executive Director of Internet Technologies for InfoImage, Inc., an IBM and Microsoft products and integration company.

John has consulted to a variety of companies at various stages of maturity including AIG, Bank of America, BiggerPhotos.com, British Airways, Cexi.me, Cocomo & Friends, Epaperchase.com, Firemanâ€™s Fund, Gillette, Honeywell, Mideo, Morgan Stanley, Nokia, Prudential, Motorola, WinMyHouse.com, Wherephone.
